message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust later if you're not happy.
Alice, your initial offer was quite low. Let's be realistic. How about a 70/30 split in my favor? This reflects the time pressure we're both under.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60 in your favor. This is the best I can do given the inflation pressure.  If we keep rejecting, we'll both get less in the end.
